Daily.name: Morning Prayer
Daily.content: Thank you, Lord, for a new day. Amen.

Daily.name: Evening Prayer
Daily.content: Thank you, Lord, for a day well spent. Amen.

Healing.name: Healing Prayer
Healing.content: Lord, grant healing and peace. Amen.

Healing.name: Forgiveness Prayer
Healing.content: Lord, help me forgive and be forgiven. Amen.

Gratitude.name: Gratitude Prayer
Gratitude.content: Thank you for all the blessings, Lord. Amen.

Gratitude.name: Protection Prayer
Gratitude.content: Lord, keep us safe from harm.
